parent_faq_section_1_category_1_question: Hur kopplar jag ihop med någon annan?
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_1: Koppla ihop via SMS, QR-kod eller e-post. Gå till : Inställningar -> Mina kontakter -> Lägg till kontakt
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_question: Vem kan jag koppla ihop med?
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_2: Supporters måste koppla ihop med barn för att använda appen. Varför? För Gimi är för barn!
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_question: Behöver jag ha ett barn för att använda Gimi?
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_3: Gimi’s uppdrag är att ge barn financial superskills. För att göra det, måste barn vara inblandade!
parent_faq_section_1_category_2_question: Kan jag lägga till fler supporters till mitt barn?
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_question_1: Hur kopplar jag ihop med någon annan?
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_1: Koppla ihop via SMS, QR-kod eller e-post. Gå till : Inställningar -> Mina kontakter -> Lägg till kontakt
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_question_2: Vem kan jag koppla ihop med?
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_2: Du måste koppla ihop med en supporter för att använda appen. Supporters kan vara föräldrar, mor- och farföräldrar eller andra familjemedlemmar. Supporters är människor som betalar dig
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_question_3: Hur många supporters kan jag ha?
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_3: Du kan koppla ihop med flera supporters! Bjud in hela familjen!
parent_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_1: Barn kan skapa ett konto med e-post eller telefonnummer. De behöver inte en egen telefon, bara åtkomst till en enhet för att komma åt appen.
parent_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_2: Barn kan skapa ett konto med e-post eller telefonnummer. Har de ingen e-post, använd din egen!
parent_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_1: Gimi har ingen åldersgräns men vi rekommenderar från 7 år.
parent_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_1: Gimi är inte kopplat till en bank, pengar flyttas aldrig över från ditt riktiga konto. Gimi är ett verktyg som håller koll på hur mycket pengar supporters är skyldiga sina barn!
parent_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_2: Pengarna i Gimi är inte riktiga pengar. Det representerar hur mycket du är skyldig ditt barn. När du ger ditt barn riktiga pengar drar du av den summan från Gimi.
parent_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_3: Supporters kan ändra valuta om de bara har ett barn, och bara om det barnet inte är hopkopplad med någon annan. Gå till Inställningar -> Användarinställningar -> Valuta
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_1: Du betalar ut summan ditt barn har sparat på Payday! Veckopengen, sparbonus och belöning för uppgifter läggs till i Sparat. Efter Payday börjar en ny nedräkning!
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_question: Hur ändrar jag datum för Payday?
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_2: Supporters kan ändra Payday. Gå till -> Inställningar ->  Inställningar för (ditt barn) -> Payday, veckopeng och ränta
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_3: Vi rekommenderar att separerade föräldrar betalar varsin halva varje vecka, det är enklare för barn att lära sig när deras veckopeng är återkommande och regelbunden.
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_question: Hur mycket ska jag ge i veckopeng?
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_4: Du bestämmer hur mycket ditt barn är redo att hantera. När du ställer in veckopengen i Gimi får du en rekommendation baserat på ålder.
kid_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_1: Pengarna i Gimi är inte riktiga pengar. Det representerar hur mycket du är skyldig ditt barn. När du ger ditt barn riktiga pengar drar du av den summan från Gimi.
kid_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_2: Fråga dina supporters, de har dina pengar! När du får pengar från dem, drar de drar av summan från Sparat.
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_1: Du får pengar på Payday! Pengarna du får är din veckopeng, belöning för uppgifter och din sparbonus. Efter Payday börjar en ny nedräkning!
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_question_2: Hur ändrar jag datum för Payday?
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_2: Det är bara Supporters som kan ändra datum för Payday, fråga dem!
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_question_3: Hur mycket ska jag få i veckopeng?
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_3: Dina föräldrar bestämmer hur mycket du ska få i veckopeng, fråga dem!
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_question: Hur ändrar eller raderar jag en uppgift?
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_1: Det är bara supporters som kan ändra eller radera en uppgift om den inte har godkänts. Godkända uppgifter kan inte ändras, dra av summan från Sparat istället.
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK The money a child earns for doing chores is paid out on Payday, together with their weekly or monthly allowance and interest.
parent_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK A dream is something that a child is currently saving up for, like a pair of headphones or a trip. A dream can only be added and changed by a child.
parent_faq_section_4_category_3_question: PLZ_CHECK How do I turn notifications on/off?
parent_faq_section_4_category_3_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Push notifications remind you of important events, like Payday. Go to Settings -> App settings -> Push notifications
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_question_1: PLZ_CHECK How do I suggest a chore?
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Go to the "Earn" tab. Pick a category under the "suggest chore" section. Then choose one the chores that we have suggested or create your own!
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_question_2: PLZ_CHECK How do I change or delete a chore?
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK Only supporters can delete or change a chore that has not already been approved. Approved chores cannot be changed - supporters can deduct the amount from the your savings instead.
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_question_3: PLZ_CHECK What happens to completed chores?
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_3: PLZ_CHECK The money you earn for doing chores is paid out on Payday, together with your weekly or monthly allowance.
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_question_1: PLZ_CHECK How do I start saving for a Dream?
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Go to: Dream -> Add. You can choose among popular dreams or create your own!
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_question_2: PLZ_CHECK I saved enough money for my dream!
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK Congratulations! You can ask your supporters to buy it for you, or archive it and start saving for a new dream!
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_question_3: PLZ_CHECK How do I delete or create a new dream?
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_3: PLZ_CHECK Tap on your dream image! From here you can edit or delete your current dream.
kid_faq_section_3_category_3_question_1: PLZ_CHECK How do I turn notifications on/off?
kid_faq_section_3_category_3_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Push notifications will remind you about important events. Go to Settings -> User settings to switch them on/off.
parent_faq_section_5: PLZ_CHECK Gimi Master & The Gimi card
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Gimi Master is a paid subscription that upgrades the Gimi app for children who are ready to handle their own money. Gimi Master includes a prepaid Mastercard that children use to spend real money and a seperate account for the money they want to save.
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK The Gimi Card is a prepaid Mastercard issued by Prepaid Financial Services Limited, pursuant to a license from Mastercard International Incorporated. Prepaid Financial Services Limited is regulated and authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority.
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_question: PLZ_CHECK How does the Gimi Card work?
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_3: PLZ_CHECK The Gimi Card is connected to the Gimi app. It allows children to spend their own money and teaches them financial literacy. The card works online, but parents have the option to block online shopping. Supporters also get full insight into spending behaviour, and notifications about card activity.
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_question: PLZ_CHECK Is my child ready for a card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_4: PLZ_CHECK Parents decide when their children are ready for a card, there is no universal age. But we recommend it from ages 10+. Still not sure? We have a card test for children, find it in your app under Settings or on our website.
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_question: PLZ_CHECK Where can children use the Gimi Card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK The Gimi Card can be used online and in stores. The card does not work in ATMs or at blocked merchants that are not appropriate for children.
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK Supporters top-up the card by adding their own card to the Gimi app. Go to: Settings -> Payment method and add a card!
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_question: PLZ_CHECK How is money transferred between the card and account?
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_3: PLZ_CHECK Only children can transfer money between the card and their Gimi account.
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_question: PLZ_CHECK Can I get my money back?
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_4: PLZ_CHECK Gimi does not support refunds for money that's been transferred to the Gimi Card or the account.
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_question: PLZ_CHECK The Gimi Card & Scooter Apps
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_5: PLZ_CHECK Most electric scooter apps don’t accept prepaid cards like the Gimi Card. Start by checking their policy regarding age limits and accepted cards. If they do accept prepaid cards, contact us!
parent_faq_section_5_category_3_question: PLZ_CHECK How much does the Gimi Card cost?
parent_faq_section_5_category_3_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK The card is included in the Gimi Master subscription. Supporters pay a subscription fee to upgrade to Gimi Master. The price varies depending on whether you pay monthly, yearly or for a lifetime. Find an updated price list for subscriptions under Settings.
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_question: PLZ_CHECK How do I order the Gimi Card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Supporters must first buy a Gimi Master subscription. Go to Settings --> Subscriptions and pick a child that you want to upgrade to Master. Tap 'Get Gimi Master' and follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_question: PLZ_CHECK Who can order a Gimi card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK Only supporters can order the Gimi Card, it's currently only available in Sweden. You need a Swedish personal number, phone number and an address.
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_question: PLZ_CHECK How is the Gimi Card activated?
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Children can activate the card as soon as it's issued. Go to the new card account and press 'Activate'! The plastic card will arrive in the mail within 14 days.
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_question: PLZ_CHECK When will the plastic Gimi Card arrive?
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK The plastic Gimi Card will arrive within 14 days from the date of order.
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_question: PLZ_CHECK How do I block the Gimi card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Go to Card --> Card settings -> Turn off "Card is active"
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_question: PLZ_CHECK The Gimi Card was lost!
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK If your child thinks they lost it, block the card. If you find it, you can unblock it again! If you can't find it, keep it blocked and contact us for a replacement!
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_question: PLZ_CHECK The Gimi Card was stolen!
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_3: PLZ_CHECK Block the Gimi Card immediately! Go to: Card -> Card settings -> Turn off 'Card is active' and contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com to for a replacement.
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_question: PLZ_CHECK How do I unblock a Gimi Card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_4: PLZ_CHECK If the Gimi Card has been blocked by a supporter, the supporter that blocked it is the only one who can unblock it. If you are the supporter that blocked it, go to Card --> Card Settings --> Turn off 'Card is active'.
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_question: PLZ_CHECK Why do I need an app passcode?
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Using Gimi Master means managing real money in the app. We added a passcode for extra security to make sure your money is safe with Gimi.
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_question: PLZ_CHECK How do I change my passcode?
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK Go to: Settings -> App Settings and then follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_question: PLZ_CHECK How do I cance my subscriptionl?
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Go to: Settings -> Subscriptions and follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_question: PLZ_CHECK What happens if I cancel my subscription?
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK If you end your Gimi Master subscripition, the card and the account will be closed. Gimi will revert back to the free Beginner version.
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_question: PLZ_CHECK What happens with the money if I cancel?
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_answer_3: PLZ_CHECK If you have any funds left on the card or account after you cancel, please contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com so that we can transfer the money back to your bank account.
kid_faq_section_4: PLZ_CHECK Gimi Master & The Gimi card
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Gimi Master is a paid subscription that upgrades the Gimi app for children who are ready to manage their own money. It comes with a prepaid Mastercard for spending and an account for saving.
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK The Gimi Card is a prepaid Mastercard issued by Prepaid Financial Services Limited, pursuant to a license from Mastercard International Incorporated. Prepaid Financial Services Limited is regulated and authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority.
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_question_3: PLZ_CHECK How does the Gimi Card work?
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_3: PLZ_CHECK The Gimi Card is connected to the Gimi app. It allows children to spend their own money and teaches them financial literacy. The card works online, but supporters have the option to block online shopping. Supporters also get full insight into spending behaviour, and notifications about card activity.
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_question_1: PLZ_CHECK Where can I use the Gimi card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK The card can be used online, and in all stores. The card does not work in ATMs, and at some merchants that we blocked, as they are not appropriate to children.
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK Supporters top-up the card by adding their own card to the Gimi app. Go to: Settings -> Payment method and add a card!
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_question_3: PLZ_CHECK How do I transfer money between the card and account?
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_3: PLZ_CHECK Go to: Card -> Top-up card  and enter the amount you want to transfer!
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_question_4: PLZ_CHECK The Gimi Card & Scooter Apps
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_4: PLZ_CHECK Most electric scooter apps don’t accept prepaid cards like the Gimi Card. Start by checking their policy regarding age limits and accepted cards. If they do accept prepaid cards, contact us!
kid_faq_section_4_category_4_question_2: PLZ_CHECK Who can order a Gimi card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_4_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK Only supporters can order the Gimi Card, and it's currently only available in Sweden for now. You need a Swedish personal number, phone number and address.
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_question_1: PLZ_CHECK How do I activate my Gimi Card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Children can activate the card as soon as it's issued. Go to the new card account and press 'Activate'! The plastic card will arrive in the mail within 14 days.
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_question_2: PLZ_CHECK When will the plastic card arrive?
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK The plastic Gimi Card will arrive within 14 days from the date of order.
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_question_1: PLZ_CHECK How do I block the Gimi Card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Go to Card  -> Card settings -> Turn off "Card is active"
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_question_2: PLZ_CHECK I lost my Gimi card!
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK If you think you lost it, block the card. If you find it, you can unblock it again! If you can't find it, keep it blocked and contact us for a replacement!
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_3: PLZ_CHECK Block your Gimi Card immediately! Go to: Card -> Card settings -> Turn off 'Card is active' and contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com to for a replacement.
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_question_4: PLZ_CHECK How do I unblock a blocked card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_4: PLZ_CHECK If the Gimi Card has been blocked by a supporter, they are the only one who can unblock it. If you blocked it, go to Card --> Card Settings --> Turn off 'Card is active'.
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_question_1: PLZ_CHECK I forgot my PIN code!
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK No worries, you can always find your PIN code in the app. Go to: Card -> Card Settings -> Show PIN code.
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_question_2: PLZ_CHECK I entered the wrong PIN code!
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK If you type the wrong PIN code 3 times, the card will be automatically blocked. Contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com to unblock it!
kid_faq_section_4_category_8_question_1: PLZ_CHECK My purchase didn't go through!
kid_faq_section_4_category_8_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK First, check your balance to see if you have enough money on your Gimi Card, and check that it's activae. If there is enough money on the Gimi Card and it is active, please contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com and we'll figure it out!
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_question_1: PLZ_CHECK Why do I need an app passcode?
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Using Gimi Master means managing real money in the app. We added a passcode for extra security to make sure your money is safe with Gimi.
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_question_2: PLZ_CHECK How do I change my passcode?
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK Go to: Settings -> App Settings and then follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_question: PLZ_CHECK How do I delete my user account?
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_question: PLZ_CHECK I want to create a new user account.
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK To delete your current account, go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account. Then start over by creating a new account!
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_question_1: PLZ_CHECK How do I delete my user account?
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK Go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_question_2: PLZ_CHECK I want to create a new user account
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK To delete your current account, go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account. Then start over by creating a new account!
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_question: PLZ_CHECK How is my personal data protected by Gimi?
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK All user data is protected by extensive fire walls on encrypted servers. We are compliant with GDPR, The Swedish Data Protection Authority and PCI DSS. Gimi never shares or sells any user data with third parties, except when required for legal reasons, such as with our card issuer and ID verification provider for card users.
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_question: PLZ_CHECK How can I delete my personal data?
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK If you delete your user account all of your personal data will be deleted. Please not that it's not enough to uninstall the app, you need to delete the account from inside the app.
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_question_1: PLZ_CHECK How is my personal data protected by Gimi?
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_CHECK All user data is protected by extensive fire walls on encrypted servers. We are compliant with GDPR, The Swedish Data Protection Authority and PCI DSS. Gimi never shares or sells any user data with third parties, except when required for legal reasons, such as with our card issuer and ID verification provider for card users.
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_question_2: PLZ_CHECK How can I delete my personal data?
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_CHECK If you delete your user account all of your personal data will be deleted. Please not that it's not enough to uninstall the app, you need to delete the account from inside the app.
